titleInfo.title: Data publication for "Medium-induced fragmentation and equilibration of highly energetic partons"

mods.abstract: Data Publication for "Medium-induced fragmentation and equilibration of highly energetic parton", published in JHEP 07 (2021) 077 available at arXiv:2008.04928 Contains data and scripts for the plots.
